Vineland.The Ellison School:
The Ellison School is a private, nonsectarian coeducational day school located in Vineland, New Jersey, United States, serving students in todlers ( 2 year olds ) through eighth grade. The school has a total enrollment of 97 students.
With 97 students and 18.1 teachers (on an FTE basis), the school has a student/teacher ratio of 6.1.
